properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1 v7 c1 v8 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Pillalara na mata vinudi Yehovayandu bakthi nerpedanu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Keedu maani melune cheyumu Samadhanamu vedaki ventaadu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yohova drusti neethimanthulapai Kaladu vaari moral vinunu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Dhustula Jnaapakamun bhuminundi Kottiveyu thana sannidhi nundi{/lang-eng}
